abilities.name: Leap Slam
about: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way

abilities.name: Delayed Blast
about: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast

abilities.name: Slam
about: Strikes enemy foes down with a powerful blow

abilities.name: Summon Animated Guardian
about: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter
